+    public void removeMovie(Movie movie) %7B%0D%0A        if (movie == null) %7B%0D%0A            throw new IllegalArgumentException(%22Movie cannot be null%22);%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A        boolean removed = movies.remove(movie);%0D%0A        if (!removed) %7B%0D%0A            throw new IllegalArgumentException(%22Movie not found in collection: %22 + movie.getTitle());%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A    public void removeSeries(Series series) %7B%0D%0A        if (series == null) %7B%0D%0A            throw new IllegalArgumentException(%22Series cannot be null%22);%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A        boolean removed = this.series.remove(series);%0D%0A        if (!removed) %7B%0D%0A            throw new IllegalArgumentException(%22Series not found in collection: %22 + series.getTitle());%0D%0A        %7D%0D%0A    %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A
